qoutes.text: Yeah, we are not dating each other, but talking to you makes my anxiety disappear. I don't find anyone else attractive anymore.
I get butterflies, when I see your name pop up on my screen. You make me smile so easily.
My sad thoughts go away when I talk with you. You are the only person who I talk throughout the whole day.
Your absence is stronger to me than the presence of thousands of other people. Some part of me still believes in us.
You mean the whole world to me, and I hope you realize that.

propose.text: I'm not sure what life could bring you. I'm not sure if dreams will come true. But I'm sure about one thing, that I care about you, and I will not stop loving you.
propose.subtext: That's all I will wait for your reply
